item.description:
Every 2 weeks Boston 911 Truth holds a Conspiracy Cafe - a partly social, partly educational, partly action-oriented event. They have met about 3 times so far and it is still evolving. Details are on their site, but we'll post what we get from them here later.

Location: the Democracy Center, 45 Mt. Auburn Street, Harvard Square, Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Directions on the DC site.

Several of us from MV911T plan to go down there to check it out. Let's work on carpooling details to make it a fun, economical event together. As we've done before, we can have dinner together in Harvard Square with other area activists.

The $5 fee we list is for gas money for carpoolers. There is no charge for the Conspiracy Cafe, though I'm sure Boston 911 Truth would appreciate donations to cover the cost of rental of the Democracy Center.

-------------------------

CARPOOLING:
Meet up for carpooling at:

Manchester - Murphy's Tap Room 494 Elm Street, 1:15 PM (leaving promptly then)
This carpool group will probably be staying til the end and not returning to Manchester til 9PM, or so.

If you want to go earlier, you should proceed on your own. Hopefully, we can set up earlier carpooling for the next Conspiracy Cafe.
item.name: Conspiracy Cafe - Cambridge, Massachusetts
